page.title: 03Kelso Electronics
page.content: Computers in Kelso are coming in fast. Many people use them. They may be good for doing some things but there are many people out of work because of computers. The people who make them have got a job. There are more electronic devices getting built now than there ever were before. That is probably why so many people are in the electronics business. Keltek and Neves are two electronics factories in Kelso. I know a lot of people who work in these factories. Their main job is assembling computers and printing electronic circuits. One of the factories makes sound consoles for recording studios. Many businesses in Kelso use computers these days for much of their office work. All the schools in Kelso have computers. Our school, Broomlands, has three computers which we use every day.
